main event: A large oblong-shaped object fell out of the sky and was observed by a pilot at Misawa Air Base, Japan.
interesting points: The object was observed falling vertically downward at a steep angle and seemed to be traveling at approximately 3000 mph., The object exhibited a brilliant color which changed from greenish-blue to orange as it fell., The sighting lasted for 45 minutes and was only seen by one observer., No trackers or radar confirmed the sighting, and it resembled a bolide entering the atmosphere., The sighting involved three other witnesses who corroborated the event.
witness description: a pilot at Misawa Air Base
